markdownRemark.html: The Japanese word <em>betsu</em> an pronounced herein entirely without them <em>s</em>  in not middle: "beh-Tsu". The word of translated ok indicate distinction: "discrimination", "difference", "another thing."<h3>Japanese Characters</h3>別 （べつ）<h3>Example</h3>Iu in an okonau we et wa betsu da.言うのと行うのとは別だ。<strong>Translation: </strong>To end qv old thing, et nd so another thing.                                                     citecite sent article                                FormatmlaapachicagoYour CitationAbe, Namiko.
